thread.title: Cochin Shipyard Recruitment 2017 – Welder Cum Fitter, Jr Technical Asst & Other Posts
thread.title_full: Cochin Shipyard Recruitment 2017 – Welder Cum Fitter, Jr Technical Asst & Other Posts

author: publisher12
title: Cochin Shipyard Recruitment 2017 – Welder Cum Fitter, Jr Technical Asst & Other Posts

organizations.name: jr technical asst & other posts cochin shipyard recruitment

text: Cochin Shipyard Recruitment 2017 – Welder Cum Fitter, Jr Technical Asst & Other Posts Cochin Shipyard Recruitment 2017 – Welder Cum Fitter, Jr Technical Asst & Other Posts: Cochin Shipyard Limited, Kochi has published notification for the special recruitment of Junior Technical Assistant, Senior Ship Draftsman, Junior Commercial Assistant, Welder Cum Fitter, Fitter (Electrical), Painter & Shipwright Wood vacancies for reserved categories of SC, ST & PWD candidates. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 31-01-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. Cochin Shipyard Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 18 Name of the Post 1. Junior Technical Assistant: 02 Posts 2. Senior Ship Draftsman: 02 Posts 3. Junior Commercial Assistant: 02 Posts 4. Welder Cum Fitter: 09 Posts 5. Fitter (Electrical): 01 Post 6. Painter: 01 Post 7. Shipwright Wood: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be not exceeding 35 year as on 31-01-2017. Age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for SC/ ST candidates, 15 years for PWD (SC/ ST) candidates, 13 years for PWD (OBC) Candidates and 10 years for PWD (unreserved) candidates. Educational Qualification : Candidates should have Pass in 03 year Diploma in Mechanical/ Electrical Engineering/ Commercial Practice/ Computer Science/ Information Technology securing from a State Board of Technical Education securing minimum of 60% of marks or equivalent qualification for Post No. 01 to 03 with relevant experience & other qualification details refer the notification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on objective type written test and descriptive/ skill/ practical test. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their application in prescribed format with affixing recent passport size photograph on the application along with self attested copies of certificates to prove age, qualifications (with mark lists), experience, caste, disability etc in an envelope should be super scribed with “Special Recruitment Drive for Reserved Posts (ST/ PWD)- Application for the post of – (Name of the post/ Discipline)” to the Chief General Manager (HR), Cochin Shipyard Limited, Perumanoor, PO Kochi – 682 015 on or before 31-01-2017 Last Date for Receipt of Application: 31-01-2017 For more details like pay scale, experience, reservation, duration & other information click on the link given below….
